metadata.inclusion: Press the Z-Wave PROG button 3 times quickly. The Z-Wave LED turns off when successful.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Power on the device
2. Press the Z-Wave PROG button 3 times quickly
3. The Z-Wave LED flashes when successful
metadata.reset:
1. Power off the device
2. Press and hold the Z-Wave PROG button
3. Power on the device and wait for 10 seconds
4. The Z-Wave LED flashes when successful
